page.title: 09TRANSPORT: MOTORWAYS.
page.content: The area is well provided for by motorways having the M62 crossing the southern edge of the area from east to west and the M66 running north south along the eastern side of the area. The M66 runs from Darton near Middleton to Ramsbottom at the moment. It is hoped that by 1988 it will be fully build. By 1988 it will form a ring road around Manchester, which would be more efficient for drivers driving in and out of Manchester. The motorway was opened in 1976 at the moment it stretches for 10 miles.
